name: Journey to the edge of the world demo
name_original: Journey to the edge of the world demo
description:
This game is about a little creature set out to go to the end of the world on but the journey is not all that he expects, he meets all sorts of foes and visits different places

the only question is will he make it?

let me know if there should be improvements and fixes or additions this is a demo

so I want all of your opinions on anything that needs improvements

LEFT and  RIGHT arrow keys to move

A/D to dash

UP arrow key to pick up weapon

wall jumping is automatic
